com.teampc.controller.question

Interface QuestionTypeController<T extends QuestionResponse>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CodeQuestionController, MatchingQuestionController, MultipleChoiceQuestionController, ShortAnswerQuestionController

    public interface QuestionTypeController<T extends QuestionResponse>
    Created by adufrene on 11/30/15. An interface for dealing with questions of a certain type

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Question<T> createQuestion(java.lang.String prompt, java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> questionId)
      Create a question given a prompt and using supplementary information from the controller.
      void setQuestion(T questionResponse)
      begin edit question flow

    • Method Detail

      • createQuestion

        Question<T> createQuestion(java.lang.String prompt,
                           java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> questionId)
                    throws InvalidQuestionException
        Create a question given a prompt and using supplementary information from the controller. pre: prompt != null && questionId != null && questionId.map(id -> id > 0).orElse(true) post: return.getPrompt.equals(prompt) && questionId.map(id -> return.getId() == id).orElse(true)
        Throws:
        InvalidQuestionException

      • setQuestion

        void setQuestion(T questionResponse)
        begin edit question flow
